subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The aggressive driving of Kyle Busch, a budding villian and one of the most hated drivers in Nascar, has been likened to the style of Dale Earnhardt.
snippet: The aggressive driving of Kyle Busch, a budding villian and one of the most hated drivers in Nascar, has been likened to the style of Dale Earnhardt.
